ing: 1/2 cup chopped seedless watermelon, or as needed
des: "A very refreshing rum cocktail with a watermelon twist. All you need are light rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and watermelon puree. This is a house cocktail of the R Bar in New Orleans."
ins:
Blend watermelon in a blender or food processor until smooth.
Fill a shaker with ice. Pour 4 fluid ounces watermelon puree, light rum, lime juice, and simple syrup into shaker; cover and shake. Pour cocktail and ice into a pint glass and garnish with lime wedges.
